description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you save the city from a not so friendly green Alien named Iggy? He loves to drop bombs off the tops of buildings. You must catch these bombs before they hit the ground.  If you miss, they explode and you die.  You will receive power ups along the way.  You will have to deal with explosive bombs, smoke bombs, duds and changing weather conditions.  Also included are day and night time levels!
